LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.label: AI persona core
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.description: A hyper-advanced computer core that houses a peak-human-equivalent AI persona. In its isolated state, the core is dormant. Installed in a proper support structure, however, it can become a mind of great power.
LanguageData.MechSerumNeurotrainer.label: neurotrainer mech serum
LanguageData.MechSerumNeurotrainer.description: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to train a specific skill. The dose is administered through the orbit of the eye. Once released into the brain, the mechanites quickly improve the subject's skills in a specific area, transmuting themselves into neural tissue as needed.
LanguageData.MechSerumNeurotrainer.comps.1.useLabel: Use neurotrainer mech serum to learn {0}
LanguageData.MechSerumHealer.label: healer mech serum
LanguageData.MechSerumHealer.description: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to heal health conditions. The mechanites will target and heal the single worst health condition affecting someone at any given time. Works even on health conditions that would otherwise be incurable. The mechanites can even transmute themselves into organic matter, forming new limbs or organs as needed.
LanguageData.MechSerumResurrector.label: resurrector mech serum
LanguageData.MechSerumResurrector.description: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to resurrect the dead. Administered to a corpse, mechanites repair broken-down tissues and kickstart the body back to life. Unfortunately, the resurrected sometimes come back with brain damage, blindness, or progressive psychosis. Outcomes are better when the mechanites are administered to a fresher body. If a body is preserved, it can even be resurrected long after death.
LanguageData.TechprofSubpersonaCore.label: techprof subpersona core
LanguageData.TechprofSubpersonaCore.description: A small AI core housing a low-grade subpersona specialized in teaching technology. When used, the AI will teach you the technology you're currently researching, instantly and for free. Can only be used once.
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.label: thrumbo horn
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.description: A thrumbo's horn. It's razor-sharp, rock-hard, and priceless in most markets. This is a true trophy, as well as a deadly melee weapon.
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.label: elephant tusk
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.description: An elephant's tusk. It is very durable and valuable. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.ElephantTusk.tools.1.label: base
